trans-unit.source: Provides a low-level encapsulation of a window handle and a window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 提供視窗控制代碼 (Window Handle) 和視窗程序 (Window Procedure) 的低階封裝。

trans-unit.source: This class automatically manages window class creation and registration.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會自動管理視窗類別建立與註冊。

trans-unit.source: A window is not eligible for garbage collection when it is associated with a window handle.
trans-unit.target: 與視窗控制代碼相關聯時，就無法進行記憶體回收的視窗。

trans-unit.source: To ensure proper garbage collection, handles must either be destroyed manually using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A> or released using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保適當的記憶體回收，控制代碼必須是終結使用手動<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A>或釋出使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> method is called when the WM_NCDESTROY message is processed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>控制訊息處理時，呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: This means there are cases in which when you do not need to manually call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>, but it is good practice to do so.
trans-unit.target: 這表示在當您不需要手動呼叫的情況下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>，但它是不錯的作法，若要這樣做。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class provides the following properties and methods to manage handles: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>類別提供了下列屬性和方法，以管理控制代碼： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure, and creating a window with a specific operating system window class name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何攔截視窗程序，並建立具有特定作業系統視窗類別名稱 視窗中的作業系統視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: The example creates two classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> that accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立兩個類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>，完成這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> method to intercept the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message.
trans-unit.target: `MyNativeWindowListener`類別連結至傳入建構函式，在表單的視窗程序，並會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>方法，以攔截`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: The class demonstrates the usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> methods to identify the window handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> will use.
trans-unit.target: 類別會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>方法來識別的視窗控制代碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>將會使用。

trans-unit.source: The handle is assign based upon the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed?displayProperty=nameWithType> events.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼會在為基礎的指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method.
trans-unit.target: 當`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收視窗訊息時，此類別會呼叫`form1.ApplicationActivated`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> set to `BUTTON`.
trans-unit.target: `MyNativeWindow`類別會建立新的視窗，內含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>設`BUTTON`。

trans-unit.source: The class demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A> method and overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> method to intercept window messages that are received.
trans-unit.target: 類別會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A>方法，並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>接收攔截視窗訊息的方法。

trans-unit.source: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.%23ctor%2A> constructor provided by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.%23ctor%2A>編譯器提供的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class also has a static constructor that initializes application domain-wide message handlers and hash tables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>類別也有靜態的建構函式，以初始化應用程式全網域的訊息處理常式和雜湊資料表。

trans-unit.source: The handle to assign to this window.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼將指派至這個視窗。

trans-unit.source: Assigns a handle to this window.
trans-unit.target: 將控制代碼指派到這個視窗。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> intercepts window messages sent to the `handle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> 攔截視窗訊息傳送至`handle`參數。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> to reset the handle's window procedure to the default window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>重設為預設視窗程序的控制代碼的視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> method to indicate that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>方法表示的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>屬性已變更。

trans-unit.source: The handle to assign cannot be in a different application process.
trans-unit.target: 若要指派的控制代碼不能在不同的應用程式處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何攔截視窗程序中的作業系統視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>完成這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> method to intercepts the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message.
trans-unit.target: `MyNativeWindowListener`類別連結至傳入建構函式，在表單的視窗程序，並會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>方法，就會攔截`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: The class demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> methods to identify which window handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> will use.
trans-unit.target: 類別會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>來識別哪一個視窗的方法會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>將會使用。

trans-unit.source: The handle is assigned based upon the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed?displayProperty=nameWithType> events.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼會根據指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method.
trans-unit.target: 當`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收視窗訊息時，此類別會呼叫`form1.ApplicationActivated`方法。

trans-unit.source: This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是摘錄自中顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity.
trans-unit.target: 為了簡潔起見，不會顯示一些程式碼。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> for the whole code listing.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>整個程式碼清單。

trans-unit.source: This window already has a handle.
trans-unit.target: 這個視窗已有控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The windows procedure for the associated native window could not be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取相關原生視窗的視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that specifies the creation parameters for this window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，指定這個視窗的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a window and its handle with the specified creation parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的建立參數建立視窗和它的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The `cp` parameter specifies the values that are passed to the native Win32 `CreateWindowEx` method to create a window and its handle.
trans-unit.target: `cp`參數指定的值傳遞至原生 Win32`CreateWindowEx`方法來建立其控制代碼和視窗。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> field is not `null`, the newly created window handle inherits from the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>欄位不是`null`，繼承自指定類別的新建立的視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> is set to `BUTTON`, the newly created window is based on the Win32 `BUTTON` window class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>設`BUTTON`，新建立的視窗根據 Win32`BUTTON`視窗類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Param%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> object must either be `null` or reference an instance of a class that was declared as a structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Param%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>物件必須是`null`或參考的已宣告為結構的類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是摘錄自中顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity.
trans-unit.target: 為了簡潔起見，不會顯示一些程式碼。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> for the whole code listing.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>整個程式碼清單。

trans-unit.source: The class name provided is registered with the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別名稱被向作業系統註冊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a window with a specific operating system window class name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立使用特定作業系統視窗類別名稱的視窗。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>完成這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> set to `BUTTON`.
trans-unit.target: `MyNativeWindow`類別會建立新的視窗，內含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>設`BUTTON`。

trans-unit.source: This creates a Win32 button window.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立 Win32 按鈕視窗。

trans-unit.source: The location and size of the button is set, along with specifying additional window styles.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕的大小與位置已設定，以及指定額外的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: The class demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A> method and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> method to intercept window messages that are received.
trans-unit.target: 類別會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A>方法，並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>接收攔截視窗訊息的方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the example looks for the WM_ACTIVATEAPP message, this can be replaced in a real program with window messages specific to the type created.
trans-unit.target: 雖然此範例會尋找 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 訊息，這可以取代實際的程式中建立之類型的特定的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Some control types send their window messages to the window parent instead of the window.
trans-unit.target: 某些控制項類型及其視窗將訊息傳送至視窗父代，而不是視窗。

trans-unit.source: See the Windows Platform SDK for more information.
trans-unit.target: Windows 平台 SDK，如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

trans-unit.source: The operating system ran out of resources when trying to create the native window.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試建立原生視窗時，作業系統耗盡資源。

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 API could not create the specified window.
trans-unit.target: 原生 Win32 API 無法建立指定的視窗。

trans-unit.source: The handle of the current native window is already assigned; in explanation, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle" /> property is not equal to <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: 已指派目前原生視窗的控制代碼。換言之，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle" /> 屬性不等於 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: to create a top-level window.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立最上層視窗。

trans-unit.source: This permission is only demanded if the window style is not a child or if the window does not have a parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果視窗樣式不是子系，或視窗沒有父代，只要求此權限。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows" />

trans-unit.source: The message that is currently being processed.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the default window procedure associated with this window.
trans-unit.target: 叫用與這個視窗相關的預設視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you only call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DefWndProc%2A> method when you are intercepting window messages and would like the default window procedure to handle the message.
trans-unit.target: 通常您只會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DefWndProc%2A>方法時，您會攔截視窗訊息，而且想要以處理訊息的預設視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DefWndProc%2A> should not be called to send a window message to the window; call the Win32 `SendMessage` function instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DefWndProc%2A> 不應該將視窗訊息傳送至視窗; 呼叫呼叫 Win32`SendMessage`函式。

trans-unit.source: It is an error to call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DefWndProc%2A> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property is 0.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫錯誤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DefWndProc%2A>時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>屬性為 0。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a derived class to implement generalized custom message handling for a specific native window or .NET Windows Forms <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法在衍生類別來實作通用的自訂訊息處理特定的原生視窗或.NET Windows Form 中<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Custom processing can be performed before, after, or instead of a call to the base class implementation of this method, which performs standard message processing.
trans-unit.target: 之前、 之後或而不是基底類別實作，這個方法，可執行標準訊息處理的呼叫，就可以執行自訂處理。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, adding customized message handling for an application can be accomplished through the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Application.AddMessageFilter(System.Windows.Forms.IMessageFilter)" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Application" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，加入自訂的訊息處理的應用程式可藉由<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Application.AddMessageFilter(System.Windows.Forms.IMessageFilter)" />方法<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Application" />類別。

trans-unit.source: Destroys the window and its handle.
trans-unit.target: 終結視窗和它的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method destroys the window associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>, sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property to 0, and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> method to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會終結與關聯的視窗<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>屬性設為 0，並呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>方法，以反映變更。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you only call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A> when you are done with the native window.
trans-unit.target: 通常您只會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.DestroyHandle%2A>當您完成使用原生的視窗。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class automatically will destroy the associated window and release its resources in response to a WM_DESTROY message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>類別會自動將損毀相關聯的視窗並釋放其資源，以回應 WM_DESTROY 訊息。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources associated with this window.
trans-unit.target: 釋放與這個視窗關聯的資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Finalize%2A> method removes the Win32 derived class associated with the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> instance, releases the handle, and posts a WM_CLOSE message to the associated window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Finalize%2A>方法會移除與目前相關聯的 Win32 衍生類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>執行個體，釋放的控制代碼，並將 WM_CLOSE 訊息張貼至相關聯的視窗。

trans-unit.source: A handle to a window.
trans-unit.target: 視窗的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the window associated with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與指定控制代碼關聯的視窗。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow" /> associated with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: 與指定控制代碼相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="null" /> when the handle does not have an associated window.
trans-unit.target: 當控制代碼沒有相關的視窗時，這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a handle from another method, use this method to retrieve the window associated with the handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的控制代碼的另一種方法時，使用這個方法來擷取與控制代碼關聯的視窗。

trans-unit.source: The handle must already be owned by another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> in the current process; otherwise, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼必須已經由另一個擁有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>在目前處理，否則`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle for this window.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個視窗的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: If successful, an <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> representing the handle to the associated native Win32 window; otherwise, 0 if no handle is associated with the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功的話，則為 <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />，表示相關原生 (Native) Win32 視窗的控制代碼，但如果沒有任何控制代碼與視窗相關聯，則為 0。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when calling Windows API methods that require a handle for a window or control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Windows API 方法需要之控制代碼的視窗或控制項時，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a window with a specific operating system window class name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立使用特定作業系統視窗類別名稱的視窗。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>完成這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> method to be notified when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>方法時通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>變更。

trans-unit.source: The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> set to BUTTON.
trans-unit.target: `MyNativeWindow`類別會建立新的視窗，內含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>設 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This creates a Win32 button window.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立 Win32 按鈕視窗。

trans-unit.source: The location and size of the button is set, along with specifying additional window styles.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕的大小與位置已設定，以及指定額外的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: The class demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A> method and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> method to intercept window messages that are received.
trans-unit.target: 類別會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A>方法，並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>接收攔截視窗訊息的方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the example looks for the WM_ACTIVATEAPP message, this could be replaced in a real program with window messages specific to the type created.
trans-unit.target: 雖然此範例會尋找 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 訊息，這可能會取代真正的程式中建立類型特有的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Some control types send their window messages to the window parent instead of the window.
trans-unit.target: 某些控制項類型及其視窗將訊息傳送至視窗父代，而不是視窗。

trans-unit.source: See the Windows Platform SDK for more information.
trans-unit.target: Windows 平台 SDK，如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a notification method that is called when the handle for a window is changed.
trans-unit.target: 指定告知方法，當視窗的控制代碼變更時便會呼叫該方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>屬性已變更。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates creating a window with a specific operating system window class name.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立使用特定作業系統視窗類別名稱的視窗。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>完成這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> method to be notified when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>方法時通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>變更。

trans-unit.source: The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A> set to `BUTTON`.
trans-unit.target: `MyNativeWindow`類別會建立新的視窗，內含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ClassName%2A>設`BUTTON`。

trans-unit.source: This creates a Win32 button window.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立 Win32 按鈕視窗。

trans-unit.source: The location and size of the button is set, along with specifying additional window styles.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕的大小與位置已設定，以及指定額外的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: The class demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A> method and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> method to intercept window messages that are received.
trans-unit.target: 類別會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.CreateHandle%2A>方法，並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>接收攔截視窗訊息的方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the example looks for the WM_ACTIVATEAPP message, this can be replaced in a real program with window messages specific to the type created.
trans-unit.target: 雖然此範例會尋找 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 訊息，這可以取代實際的程式中建立之類型的特定的視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是摘錄自中顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity.
trans-unit.target: 為了簡潔起見，不會顯示一些程式碼。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> for the whole code listing.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>整個程式碼清單。

trans-unit.source: Some control types send their window messages to the window parent instead of the window.
trans-unit.target: 某些控制項類型及其視窗將訊息傳送至視窗父代，而不是視窗。

trans-unit.source: See the Windows Platform SDK for more information.
trans-unit.target: Windows 平台 SDK，如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to track changes that are made to the window handle.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，以追蹤的視窗控制代碼所做的變更。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that specifies the unhandled thread exception.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" />，指定無法處理的執行緒例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, manages an unhandled thread exception.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，管理無法處理的執行緒例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OnThreadException%2A> handles thread exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.OnThreadException%2A>控制代碼的執行緒例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Releases the handle associated with this window.
trans-unit.target: 釋放與這個視窗相關的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method does not destroy the window handle.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會終結的視窗控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it sets the handle's window procedure to the default window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它將控制代碼的視窗程序設定為預設視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A> property to 0 and calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A> to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 它會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.Handle%2A>屬性設為 0 並呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.OnHandleChange%2A>以反映變更。

trans-unit.source: A window automatically calls this method if it receives a native Win32 WM_NCDESTROY message, indicating that Windows has destroyed the handle.
trans-unit.target: 視窗會自動呼叫這個方法，如果收到指出 Windows 已終結的控制代碼的原生 Win32 控制訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何攔截視窗程序中的作業系統視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>完成這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> method to intercepts the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message.
trans-unit.target: `MyNativeWindowListener`類別連結至傳入建構函式，在表單的視窗程序，並會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>方法，就會攔截`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: The class demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> methods to identify the window handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> will use.
trans-unit.target: 類別會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>方法來識別的視窗控制代碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>將會使用。

trans-unit.source: The handle is assign based upon the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed?displayProperty=nameWithType> events.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼會在為基礎的指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method.
trans-unit.target: 當`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收視窗訊息時，此類別會呼叫`form1.ApplicationActivated`方法。

trans-unit.source: This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是摘錄自中顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity.
trans-unit.target: 為了簡潔起見，不會顯示一些程式碼。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> for the whole code listing.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>整個程式碼清單。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> that is associated with the current Windows message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，與目前 Windows 訊息相關。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the default window procedure associated with this window.
trans-unit.target: 叫用與這個視窗相關的預設視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a window message is sent to the handle of the window.
trans-unit.target: 視窗訊息傳送至視窗的控制代碼時，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何攔截視窗程序中的作業系統視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>完成這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A> method to intercept the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message.
trans-unit.target: `MyNativeWindowListener`類別連結至傳入建構函式，在表單的視窗程序，並會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc%2A>方法，以攔截`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`視窗訊息。

trans-unit.source: The class demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A> methods to identify the window handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> will use.
trans-unit.target: 類別會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.AssignHandle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.ReleaseHandle%2A>方法來識別的視窗控制代碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>將會使用。

trans-unit.source: The handle is assigned based upon the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed?displayProperty=nameWithType> events.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼會根據指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method.
trans-unit.target: 當`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收視窗訊息時，此類別會呼叫`form1.ApplicationActivated`方法。

trans-unit.source: This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是摘錄自中顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity.
trans-unit.target: 為了簡潔起見，不會顯示一些程式碼。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow> for the whole code listing.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow>整個程式碼清單。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to implement specific message processing.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以實作特定的訊息處理。

trans-unit.source: Call <c>base.WndProc</c> for unhandled messages.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<c>基底。WndProc</c>未處理的訊息。
